Created an attachment (id=2857)
M4 doesn't compile this source.

In Window->Preferences->Java->Compiler->JDK Compliance, set the following:

Compiler compliance level: 1.4
[X] Use default compliance settings

Then build a project with the attached source. The NPE should raise.
I believe that this is a duplicate of bug 28750.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 28750 ***
